title: Zebra Face
description:
A zebra, a horse-like mammal with black-and-white stripes. Variously depicted in full profile on all fours facing left or as a zebra head facing left with a short mane.

Not to be confused with üêé Horse. Some vendors implement a similar face as their üê¥ Horse Face.

Apple, Microsoft, WhatsApp, Samsung, and Facebook’s designs feature the full animal; Google and Twitter's designs feature a head with a short mane and black muzzle. Facebook’s design previously featured only a zebra head, as did Samsung's.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the zebra emoji gallops with bold black and white stripes that pop against a clean background, all rendered with Apple's characteristic glossy 3D aesthetic. Its form is slightly rounded and smooth, reflecting realistic lighting to create a sense of playful movement. This majestic creature, depicted with a friendly yet wild spirit, often symbolizes uniqueness, nature, or a touch of the exotic in digital conversations on Apple devices.
